account.externalId.description: Set the bank account that will be used to pay these bills.
account.externalId.name: account.externalId

account.internalId.description: Set the bank account that will be used to pay these bills.
account.internalId.name: account.internalId

account.name.description: Set the bank account that will be used to pay these bills.
account.name.name: account.name

address.description: NetSuite automatically generates the mailing address of the vendor from the record at Lists > Relationships > Vendors. You can change the address here for just this transaction by typing up to four rows of information.
address.name: address

apAcct.externalId.description: Set the Accounts Payable account that will be affected by this transaction.
apAcct.externalId.name: apAcct.externalId

apAcct.internalId.description: Set the Accounts Payable account that will be affected by this transaction.
apAcct.internalId.name: apAcct.internalId

apAcct.name.description: Set the Accounts Payable account that will be affected by this transaction.
apAcct.name.name: apAcct.name

approvalStatus.externalId.description: In the Approval Status field, choose one of the following:    * Approved – No further review or approval processing is required before a payment is processed.    * Pending Approval – Bills with a Pending Approval status require that someone with permission must approve the bill before a payment can be processed for it.    * Rejected – The payment cannot be processed further.
approvalStatus.externalId.name: approvalStatus.externalId

approvalStatus.internalId.description: In the Approval Status field, choose one of the following:    * Approved – No further review or approval processing is required before a payment is processed.    * Pending Approval – Bills with a Pending Approval status require that someone with permission must approve the bill before a payment can be processed for it.    * Rejected – The payment cannot be processed further.
approvalStatus.internalId.name: approvalStatus.internalId

approvalStatus.name.description: In the Approval Status field, choose one of the following:    * Approved – No further review or approval processing is required before a payment is processed.    * Pending Approval – Bills with a Pending Approval status require that someone with permission must approve the bill before a payment can be processed for it.    * Rejected – The payment cannot be processed further.
approvalStatus.name.name: approvalStatus.name

availableBalance.description: The Available Balance is displayed for the selected account.The bank account available balance is calculated as follows:     * Bank account balance - Sum of outstanding in-transit payments = Available balance
availableBalance.name: availableBalance

balance.description: NetSuite automatically shows the balance in this bank account.
balance.name: balance

billPay.description: Check this box to send this payment online.You must follow the set up procedure in How Do I Set Up Online Bill Pay before you can use this feature.The NetSuite basic package includes a set number of bill pay transactions. Click the Charges May Apply link for more information.
billPay.name: billPay

currency.externalId.description: Select the vendor's transaction currency you want to enter this bill in.
currency.externalId.name: currency.externalId

currency.internalId.description: Select the vendor's transaction currency you want to enter this bill in.
currency.internalId.name: currency.internalId

currency.name.description: Select the vendor's transaction currency you want to enter this bill in.
currency.name.name: currency.name

currencyName.description: This field auto-populates based on selection of Payee (entity).
currencyName.name: currencyName

customForm.externalId.description: Select the form to use for this payment. Custom forms you have previously created can be chosen.
customForm.externalId.name: customForm.externalId

customForm.internalId.description: Select the form to use for this payment. Custom forms you have previously created can be chosen.
customForm.internalId.name: customForm.internalId

customForm.name.description: Select the form to use for this payment. Custom forms you have previously created can be chosen.
customForm.name.name: customForm.name

department.externalId.description: References a value from a user defined list at Setup > Company > Departments. This field is required when the Make Departments Mandatory preference is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation.
department.externalId.name: department.externalId

department.internalId.description: References a value from a user defined list at Setup > Company > Departments. This field is required when the Make Departments Mandatory preference is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation.
department.internalId.name: department.internalId

department.name.description: References a value from a user defined list at Setup > Company > Departments. This field is required when the Make Departments Mandatory preference is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation.
department.name.name: department.name

entity.externalId.description: Select the payee for this purchase. Select a vendor to pay vendor bills. Select an employee to pay an employee expense. In the UI, go to Lists > Relationships > Vendors for details about existing suppliers. Go to Lists > Employees > Employees for details about existing employees.
entity.externalId.name: entity.externalId

entity.internalId.description: Select the payee for this purchase. Select a vendor to pay vendor bills. Select an employee to pay an employee expense. In the UI, go to Lists > Relationships > Vendors for details about existing suppliers. Go to Lists > Employees > Employees for details about existing employees.
entity.internalId.name: entity.internalId

entity.name.description: Select the payee for this purchase. Select a vendor to pay vendor bills. Select an employee to pay an employee expense. In the UI, go to Lists > Relationships > Vendors for details about existing suppliers. Go to Lists > Employees > Employees for details about existing employees.
entity.name.name: entity.name

exchangeRate.description: The currency's exchange rate is shown in this field.You can edit the exchange rate for this transaction only, or you can update the currency record with the exchange rate you set here.
exchangeRate.name: exchangeRate

isInTransitPayment.description: Check the In Transit box to designate this vendor payment as an In-Transit Payment.This defaults based on the setting for the Use In-Transit Vendor Payments by Default preference.The In Transit box can be checked only when first creating a payment. After the payment form is saved, this setting cannot be changed.Clear this box if this vendor payment is not an In-Transit payment.The setting for this field cannot be changed after the form is saved.
isInTransitPayment.name: isInTransitPayment

location.externalId.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Locations. This field is required when Make Locations Mandatory is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation.
location.externalId.name: location.externalId

location.internalId.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Locations. This field is required when Make Locations Mandatory is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation.
location.internalId.name: location.internalId

location.name.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Locations. This field is required when Make Locations Mandatory is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation.
location.name.name: location.name

memo.description: Enter a memo that shows the vendor's invoice number or your account number. This appears on the memo line of the check.
memo.name: memo

nextApprover.externalId.description: This field displays the employee designated as the approver on the employee record. If no approver is selected, the supervisor approves payments. If both a supervisor and an approver are selected, either can approve the payment.
nextApprover.externalId.name: nextApprover.externalId

nextApprover.internalId.description: This field displays the employee designated as the approver on the employee record. If no approver is selected, the supervisor approves payments. If both a supervisor and an approver are selected, either can approve the payment.
nextApprover.internalId.name: nextApprover.internalId

nextApprover.name.description: This field displays the employee designated as the approver on the employee record. If no approver is selected, the supervisor approves payments. If both a supervisor and an approver are selected, either can approve the payment.
nextApprover.name.name: nextApprover.name

postingPeriod.externalId.description: Set the period you want to post this bill payment to. If a period is closed, you cannot post to that period.
postingPeriod.externalId.name: postingPeriod.externalId

postingPeriod.internalId.description: Set the period you want to post this bill payment to. If a period is closed, you cannot post to that period.
postingPeriod.internalId.name: postingPeriod.internalId

postingPeriod.name.description: Set the period you want to post this bill payment to. If a period is closed, you cannot post to that period.
postingPeriod.name.name: postingPeriod.name

printVoucher.description: Set to true to queue a voucher to print for this payment. After you have entered payments, you can print vouchers for them at Transactions > Management > Print Checks and Forms > Payment Vouchers.
printVoucher.name: printVoucher

subsidiary.externalId.description: In a OneWorld environment, NetSuite displays the name of the subsidiary associated with the bill in a read-only field.
subsidiary.externalId.name: subsidiary.externalId

subsidiary.internalId.description: In a OneWorld environment, NetSuite displays the name of the subsidiary associated with the bill in a read-only field.
subsidiary.internalId.name: subsidiary.internalId

subsidiary.name.description: In a OneWorld environment, NetSuite displays the name of the subsidiary associated with the bill in a read-only field.
subsidiary.name.name: subsidiary.name

toAch.description: Set to true to send this payment via ACH processing.
toAch.name: toAch

toBePrinted.description: Set to true if you want to save this in a queue of checks to print.
toBePrinted.name: toBePrinted

total.description: NetSuite automatically updates this amount as you add or edit line items.
total.name: total

tranDate.description: NetSuite inserts today's date for the posting date of this bill payment. You can set another date.The date you set here determines the date range in which this transaction appears on the Accounts Payable Register.Note that you can set custom date ranges on registers.
tranDate.name: tranDate

tranId.description: If you have set To Be Printed to true, you will choose starting check numbers later when you print those checks. If you are submitting and immediately printing this check, NetSuite increases the largest check number by one. If you wish, you can set another number here, and the next check number will revert to the standard pattern.
tranId.name: tranId

transactionNumber.description: This field displays the system-generated number associated with this transaction.
transactionNumber.name: transactionNumber

type.value.description: Select the payee for this purchase. Select a vendor to pay vendor bills. Select an employee to pay an employee expense. In the UI, go to Lists > Relationships > Vendors for details about existing suppliers. Go to Lists > Employees > Employees for details about existing employees.
type.value.name: type.value
